mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.description, a.country AS 'country.id', c.name AS 'country.name'
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM city a JOIN country c ON a.country = c.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO city( id, name, description, country, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{country.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE city SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, country = #{country.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
